Note that these processes are not completely dead since they keep reacting to 
hotcode replace, and send me some update failure notifications.

(and...) are there difinitive steps to reproduce? Are you performing a "large" 
HCR (perhaps re-building the workspace?)

VM is 1.4.1_01. I was only touching one class at a time. The HCR notice isn't 
very interesting, other than it shows that the processes were not fully dead. 
Basically, there should have been no process alive left at that stage.
V1.4.1_01 is old. Can you upgrade and see if the problems still occurr?
marking as "works for me" unless this is still an issue.
